{"id":859424778,"question_id":4,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1670980439,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"96 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/859424778/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"48 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number[]} nums1\n * @param {number[]} nums2\n * @return {number}\n */\nvar findMedianSortedArrays = function(nums1, nums2) {\n    let arr = nums1.concat(nums2);\n    arr.sort((a, b) => a - b);\n\n    let mid = (arr.length / 2) - 1;\n\n    if (Math.floor(mid) !== Math.ceil(mid)) {\n      return arr[Math.ceil(mid)];\n    } else {\n      let avg = (arr[mid] + arr[mid + 1]) / 2;\n      return avg;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
